SELECT d.DIR_CODE ,us.company ,(re.RE_AMT * pd.PD_PRICE) as sum ,re.RE_DATE ,re.RE_CODE ,re.RE_AMT ,re.MODEL_CODE ,re.WH_CODE ,ni.loginID
FROM DIRECTION d join RETURN_INFO re on d.DIR_CODE = re.DIR_CODE join PD_INFO pd on re.MODEL_CODE = pd.MODEL_CODE join JORDER_INFO jo on jo.JORD_CODE = re.JORD_CODE join tb_userinfo us on us.loginID = jo.loginID join BORDER_INFO bi on bi.BORD_CODE = re.BORD_CODE join NAP_INFO ni on bi.NAP_CODE = ni.NAP_CODE join SHIP_INFO si on re.RE_CODE = si.RE_CODE where d.DIR_TYPE = 1 and re.RE_TYPE = '1' and re.RE_DATE IS NULL and si.loginID = #{loginId} and us.company Like CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%') and re.RE_TYPE = '1' order by d.DIR_CODE DESC limit #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

select count(*)
FROM DIRECTION d join RETURN_INFO re on d.DIR_CODE = re.DIR_CODE join PD_INFO pd on re.MODEL_CODE = pd.MODEL_CODE join JORDER_INFO jo on jo.JORD_CODE = re.JORD_CODE join tb_userinfo us on us.loginID = jo.loginID join BORDER_INFO bi on bi.BORD_CODE = re.BORD_CODE join NAP_INFO ni on bi.NAP_CODE = ni.NAP_CODE join SHIP_INFO si on re.RE_CODE = si.RE_CODE where d.DIR_TYPE = 1 and re.RE_TYPE = '1' and re.RE_DATE IS NULL and si.loginID = #{loginId} and us.company Like CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%')
